text: today I'm sharing with you my favorite
recipe for hot fudge sauce it has three
ingredients it's super easy so there's
no excuse not to make your own it this
pan I have 1 cup of heavy cream to that
add a half a cup of corn syrup I know I
don't usually use corn syrup but it adds
to the texture for this you really
actually need it believe it or not bring
it up to a simmer I mean without the
corn syrup what you have here is a
ganache right adding the corn syrup to
make it a sauce you want to bring it to
a simmer I keep this in my refrigerator
at home and I'm not joking every night
well not anymore because I was told I
wasn't allowed to anymore but every
night I'll go in there and have like a
little bite of the hot fudge sauce but
not melted just solid in the fridge so
good ok then you add 12 ounces of
chopped semi-sweet chocolate I like a
61% you could do a 56 I guess if you
wanted to but something not too too
bitter if you use something like a 70%
your sauce will be extra thick so you
might need to add a little bit more
cream a little bit more corn syrup to
make it a pourable consistency I just
stir this until the chocolate melts and
everything combines and that's it that's
how it fudge sauce easy right should we
have some ice cream yes just a little
bit okay so good
spoon drizzle
who needs the ice-cream I'm just gonna
eat the hot fudge sauce right off the
spoon mmm oh my gosh make some of this
keep it in your fridge it'll last for a
couple of weeks I mean it won't go bad
but I don't know how long it'll last as
it's so delicious
enjoy
